How many years ago was the Luther Bible by Martin Luther printed?	475
How many years ago was the Luther Bible by Martin Luther printed?	475
Is german an inflected  language?	yes
In Switzerland, is ß used at all?	no
Are there two common  word  orders?	yes
Are feminines declined in the singular?	no
Is 9 %  of the Internet  population German?	no
Is german written using the Latin  alphabet?	Yes
Was the Luther Bible by Martin Luther printed?	Yes
Does a  tz indicate that the preceding vowel is short?	no
Are there 622,650 speakers of German In Canada?	Yes
Are there also large populations of German ancestry In Mexico?	yes
Would Bundesländer not accept North Rhine Westphalia and Bavaria ?	yes
Have adverbs of time to appear in the third place in the sentence , just after the predicate ?	Yes
